structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Sale And Delivery Of Seed; Avoirdupois Weight
law.text: Except as otherwise provided in chapter ninety-nine, all contracts for the sale and delivery of timothy or herdsgrass seed shall be made by avoirdupois weight. Whoever violates this section shall be punished by a fine of not more than twenty dollars.
